```{r, dpi=300, fig.width=8, fig.height=4}
gh("/repos/eventoseroficial/Data_and_Code/commits") %>% 
  map_chr(pluck, "commit", "committer", "date") %>% 
  ymd_hms() %>% 
  floor_date("day") %>% 
  as.Date() %>% 
  enframe() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "darkblue", alpha = .8) +
  theme_minimal(14) +
  labs(
```
